column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I am giving this four stars
column2: which I think may be a bit generous
column3: and here is why.  Our first trip was for dinner with another couple back in December.  Great atmosphere
column5: great drinks.  Food was great (peppered duck and goat cheese
column7: until the steak I ordered medium came out well-done.  Everyone elses steak came out impeccable and stupidly I did not send it back
column8: but rather ate it.  So that is on me.  I view this as a one-off error and probably not a reflection of a continued occurance at Bavette's.
